name: Swapster
description:
✨

In the game, the player is provides with 4 abilities and he has to clear all the levels using these abilities. The player will find casual puzzles and platforming challenges in the game. To score points he will have to collect coins and also there are in-game achievements which could be unlocked by completing challenges.

✨FEW  WORDS  FROM  DEV✨

So this is my first game , which I made as a college project. I am new to game development,  but I'm getting better day by day ,and this game is one of my milestones in my game dev journey. I hope you will like this game. If you have any recommendation or opinion feel free to leave a comment and "ENJOY THE GAME".😄😄😄
